tool_description: Validates the current status of an insurance policy including active periods, cancellation status, and renewal information.

policy_number.description: The insurance policy number to validate

validation_date.description: Date to check policy status against

error_messages: Invalid date range: Effective date must be before expiration date. Check policy dates for accuracy.
Policy cancelled: Policy was cancelled before the validation date. Verify cancellation reason and date.
Policy not yet effective: Validation date is before policy effective date. Confirm policy inception date.
Date format error: All dates must be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
usage: Input policy details and validation date to determine if policy was active on the specified date. Returns status information including any gaps or cancellations.

is_active.description: Whether the policy was active on the validation date

status.description: Current policy status (active, expired, cancelled, suspended)

days_active.description: Number of days policy was active as of validation date
